body_html:
I'm not sure how you got all the commits in there, but the right way to rebase your branch on top of master is git pull --rebase origin master (or upstream).

Please update your commits so this is easier to review! One way to do this is to check out a new branch and cherry-pick the right commits.
body_text:
I'm not sure how you got all the commits in there, but the right way to rebase your branch on top of master is git pull --rebase origin master (or upstream).
Please update your commits so this is easier to review! One way to do this is to check out a new branch and cherry-pick the right commits.
body:
I'm not sure how you got all the commits in there, but the right way to rebase your branch on top of master is `git pull --rebase origin master` (or upstream). 

Please update your commits so this is easier to review! One way to do this is to check out a new branch and cherry-pick the right commits.
